name: @hypernetlabs/developer-ui
description: Simple, complete UI that wraps hypernet-core, intended for developer use.
author: Charlie Sibbach <charlie@hyperdyne.io>

scripts.Start-windows: yarn start-backend && yarn deploy-custom-transfers && yarn start-web
scripts.bootstrap-backend: docker-compose down && docker-compose pull && docker-compose up -d && wait-on -l -d 15000 package.json && docker-compose up -d && yarn verify-backend && yarn deploy-custom-transfers
scripts.test: echo "Error: run tests from root" && exit 0
scripts.verify-backend: docker ps -f status=running -f name=developer-ui | grep connextproject | if [ `wc -l` -ne 9 ]; then echo 'Error: did not detect 9 running docker containers!' && `exit 1`; fi
